casebody.data:
ASSOCIATED STORES, INC., Appellant and Cross-Appellee, v. INDUSTRIAL LOAN AND INVESTMENT COMPANY, Appellee and Cross-Appellant. No. 9222. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued Jan. 21, 1964. Decided Jan. 24, 1964. J. C. B. Ehringhaus, Jr., Raleigh, N. C., for appellant and cross-appellee. Howard E. Manning, Raleigh, N. C. (Manning, Fulton, Skinner & Hunter, Raleigh, N. C., on brief), for appellee and cross-appellant.

Before HAYNSWORTH and BORE-MAN, Circuit Judges, and MICHIE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

For the reasons stated by the District Court in its opinion, the judgment below is affirmed. Associated Stores, Inc. v. Industrial Loan & Invest. Co., D.C.E.D. N.C., 202 F.Supp. 251.

Affirmed.
